Text: I messed the tracker list, everything is double. I hope it'll be OK, I don't wanna fix it with so many people downloading at the moment.

I have a problem, I've copy mb_warband.exe into game directory, I've patched the game to version 1.113 but when I open the game I can't join any server. It says unable to join the server. What to do ?!
Unable to connect to the server.
FIRST update, THEN overwrite the .exe files
So now I guess you only need to overwrite the .exe files one more time and you'll be OK
So I have did and still doesn't work.

Did you do that?
1. In rgl_config.txt change the use_secure_connection = 1 to use_secure_connection = 0

And that?
3. Forward/Open the UDP 7240 port(on your firewal etc.)

If so, I give up, ask at cs dot rin dot ru.

I had the same problem and found a solution that worked for me :
You have to edit 2 files rgl_config.txt; paths:
1. C:\Users\"Username"\Documents\Mount&Blade Warband\
2.C:\Users\"Username"\AppData\Roaming\Mount&Blade Warband\
For Win7 users. I don't know the path for other OS but just search the file in c: and if you get 2 results edit both.
